Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by West Texas in 1976...
Had first career hit on 8/18/1978, off Theodore Guss (LP)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/2/1978, off Carmine Rosa (PEN)...
Injured on 4/6/1981 with a Fractured Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/28/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/6/1983 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for full season...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Coney Island on 8/26/1987...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Diablo on 9/26/1987...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Northeastern on 7/28/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1989, hitting .407 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Penn on 7/24/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1989, hitting .567 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
